# MTLStoreActionOptions

**Structure**

Options that modify a store action.

## Declaration

```swift
struct MTLStoreActionOptions
```

## Overview

This property modifies the intended behavior of the store actions in the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStoreAction] enumeration.

## Using programmable sample positions

- **customSamplePositions**: An option that stores data in a sample-position–agnostic representation.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a store action option from a raw integer value.

## Encoding a render pass in parallel

- **MTLParallelRenderCommandEncoder**: An instance that splits up a single render pass so that it can be simultaneously encoded from multiple threads.
- **MTLLoadAction**: Types of actions performed for an attachment at the start of a rendering pass.
- **MTLStoreAction**: Types of actions performed for an attachment at the end of a rendering pass.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
